faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to popular questions about working with the platform

1.question: How do I get started with the platform?
1.answer: After registration, complete the questionnaire, specify your target role and current skills. The system will automatically create a personalized career development plan.

2.question: How do I upload my resume?
2.answer: Go to the 'Resume' section and click the 'Upload Resume' button. PDF, DOC, DOCX formats are supported. After uploading, the system will analyze your resume and suggest improvements.

3.question: What is a learning plan?
3.answer: A learning plan is a personalized skill development program created based on your target role and current competencies. It includes recommendations for courses, projects, and materials to study.

4.question: How do I prepare for an interview?
4.answer: In the 'Interview' section, you can select your desired role and go through an interview simulation. The system will ask relevant questions and provide feedback on your answers.

5.question: Can I change my target role?
5.answer: Yes, you can change your target role at any time in the 'Settings' section. The system will automatically update your learning plan and recommendations.

6.question: How do I track my progress?
6.answer: The 'Progress' section displays statistics on learning plan completion, interview simulation results, and resume improvement index.

7.question: Is the platform paid?
7.answer: The basic version of the platform is free. Premium features such as detailed resume analysis and unlimited interview simulations are available by subscription.

8.question: How do I change the interface language?
8.answer: The interface language can be changed in the 'Settings' section or via the language switcher at the top of the page. Russian, English, and Kazakh languages are available.
